    • Method Detail

      • arrayToDataTable

        public static final DataTable arrayToDataTable(com.google.gwt.core.client.JsArrayMixed array)
        This method takes in a 2-dimensional array and converts it to a DataTable.
        Parameters:
        array - A two-dimensional array, where each row represents a row in the data table.
        The first row will be interpreted as header labels.
        The data types of each column are interpreted automatically from the data given.
        If a cell has no value, specify a null or empty value as appropriate.
        Returns:
        a new DataTable.

      • arrayToDataTable

        public static final DataTable arrayToDataTable(com.google.gwt.core.client.JsArrayMixed array,
                         boolean firstRowIsData)
        This method takes in a 2-dimensional array and converts it to a DataTable.
        Parameters:
        array - A two-dimensional array, where each row represents a row in the data table.
        The data types of each column are interpreted automatically from the data given.
        If a cell has no value, specify a null or empty value as appropriate.
        firstRowIsData - if true, all rows are assumed to be data.
        Returns:
        a new DataTable.

      • arrayToDataTable

        public static final DataTable arrayToDataTable(Object[][] array)
        This method takes in a 2-dimensional array and converts it to a DataTable.
        Parameters:
        array - A two-dimensional array, where each row represents a row in the data table.
        The first row will be interpreted as header labels.
        The data types of each column are interpreted automatically from the data given.
        If a cell has no value, specify a null or empty value as appropriate.
        Returns:
        a new DataTable.

      • arrayToDataTable

        public static final DataTable arrayToDataTable(Object[][] array,
                         boolean firstRowIsData)
        This method takes in a 2-dimensional array and converts it to a DataTable.
        Parameters:
        array - A two-dimensional array, where each row represents a row in the data table.
        The data types of each column are interpreted automatically from the data given.
        If a cell has no value, specify a null or empty value as appropriate.
        firstRowIsData - if true, all rows are assumed to be data.
        Returns:
        a new DataTable.

      • drawChart

        public static final void drawChart(ChartWrapperSpec<?> chartWrapperSpec)
        This method creates a chart in a single call. The advantage of using this method is that it requires slightly less code, and you can serialize and save visualizations as text strings for reuse. This method does not return a handle to the created chart, so you cannot assign method listeners to catch chart events.
        Parameters:
        chartWrapperSpec - a property set for defining a chart

      • drawChart

        public static final void drawChart(String jsonLiteral)
        This method creates a chart in a single call. The advantage of using this method is that it requires slightly less code, and you can serialize and save visualizations as text strings for reuse. This method does not return a handle to the created chart, so you cannot assign method listeners to catch chart events.
        Parameters:
        jsonLiteral - a String representation of a chart
